user.title: Frigate Identity
user.description: Configure the MQTT connection and persons file. The integration subscribes to `{default_prefix}/person/#` for detection events.

data_description.mqtt_topic_prefix: Prefix for MQTT topics published by the Frigate Identity Service (default: identity).
data_description.persons_file: Absolute path to the Frigate Identity Service persons.yaml file for role metadata (child/adult, dangerous zones, etc.). Leave blank to discover persons from MQTT only.

data_description.snapshot_source: How to source person snapshot images. 'mqtt': MQTT camera entities. 'frigate_api': Frigate HTTP API. 'frigate_integration': Official Frigate HA integration entities.
data_description.auto_dashboard: Automatically create and update a Lovelace dashboard view with person tracking cards.
data_description.dashboard_refresh_time: Time of day (HH:MM) for a scheduled dashboard refresh.
